section.title: What is it
section.p: This is a model of a Membrane Computing system.

ol.li: Run the Java application through the XhnMemComp GUI (org.primordion.memcomp.app.XhnMemComp.java), and select File --> Open --> memcomp --> SymAnti02ex41 --> SymAnti02ex41_xhn.
Expand the Controller node in the tree.

section.source:
Expected Results for each membrane (for deterministic, or typical case) DIS - dissolved
Step env m1 m2 ===== ====== ====== ====== 0 abczeyfg_ ac df 1 abczeyfg_ca cbb df 2 abczeyfg_cac bb_ df 3 abczeyfg_cac bb df_ 4 abczeyfg_cac bb_ df ... "Computation was unsuccessful."

section.title: Credits and references
section.p: Paun, Gh. (2002). Membrane Computing. Example in section 4.1
